attributes.action: Prevent stoning to death of Bauchi 18 in Nigeria
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dear Prime Minister, I am outraged by the Independent newspaper article dated 14/8/07 page 36 by Philip Hensher mentioning the imminent stoning to death of 18 men in Bauchi, northern Nigeria for allegedly attending a gay wedding? Is there anything the you can do to prevent this disgusting penalty from occurring? Surely pressure can be brought to bear economically, anything to stop this barbaric practice? I hope you can stop this appalling sentence as soon as possible - please can you help? I have very little idea of whom to speak to next but perhaps you can wield some influence? Yours sincerely Rachel Ruffles.
